mapper.select: SELECT go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_ID, go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NAME FROM go_citizen WHERE go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_ID=#{citizenId}
SELECT go_doctor_id FROM go_doctor WHERE go_doctor_id = #{doctorId}
SELECT go_citizen_no, go_citizen_id, go_citizen_name FROM go_citizen WHERE go_citizen_id=#{goCitizenId} AND go_citizen_pw=#{goCitizenPw}
SELECT go_hospital_id, go_hospital_name FROM go_hospital WHERE go_hospital_id=#{goHospitalId} AND go_hospital_pw=#{goHospitalPw}
select GO_MEDICINE_CODE as goMedicineCode, GO_MEDICINE_NAME as goMedicineName from go_medicine
SELECT go_disease.GO_DISEASE_CODE as goDiseaseCode, go_disease.GO_DISEASE_KOR as goDiseaseKor, go_disease.GO_DISEASE_ENG as goDiseaseEng FROM go_disease
SELECT GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE as goTreatSubjectCode, GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_NAME as goTreatSubjectName FROM go_treat_subject
SELECT go_surgery.GO_SURGERY_CODE as goSurgeryCode, go_surgery.GO_SURGERY_NAME as goSurgeryName FROM go_surgery

SELECT go_vaccination.GO_VACCINATION_CODE as goVaccinationCode, go_vaccination.GO_VACCINATION_NAME as goVaccinationName, go_vaccination.GO_VACCINATION_DEGREE as goVaccinationDegree FROM go_vaccination
